Specimen Type: Formalin-fixed biopsy (MALT); serum (IgE and serum protein assays)
Purpose: To obtain accurate and reproducible analytical results for MALT immunohistochemistry, IgE quantification, and serum protein assays.
Container: Formalin container for biopsy; red or gold top vacutainer (no anticoagulant) for serum
Equipment: Centrifuge, ELISA reader, refrigerated incubators, microplate washer, pipettes
